ViewObject.Name: EmployeesDetailHist2View
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT EmployeesDetailHist.LAST_CHANGE_DATE, EmployeesDetailHist.IS_LAST, EmployeesDetailHist.EMPLOYEE_ID, EmployeesDetailHist.FIRST_NAME, EmployeesDetailHist.LAST_NAME, EmployeesDetailHist.JOB_ID, EmployeesDetailHist.JOB_TITLE, EmployeesDetailHist.DEPARTMENT_ID, EmployeesDetailHist.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM EMPLOYEES_DETAIL_HIST2 EmployeesDetailHist
